original_title: Irmã Lúcia, a Mensageira de Nossa Senhora
overview: It presents the life of Sister Lúcia, seer of Our Lady of Fátima, who died in the Carmel of Santa Teresa, in Coimbra, on February 13, 2005. It also brings the narration of the apparitions of Our Lady of Fátima to the three little shepherds, in 1917, in Portugal.
title: Irmã Lúcia, a Mensageira de Nossa Senhora
